articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: Coronation invites issued by King Charles and 'Queen Camilla' - BBC
articles.description: The title "Queen Camilla" is officially used on invitations to next month's coronation at Westminster Abbey.
articles.content:
The first glimpse of the coronation invitation shows the official use of "Queen Camilla", marking the transition from the title of "Queen Consort".
The ornately illustrated invitation, sent to about… [+3662 chars]

articles.author: Katherine McPhillips
articles.title: Prince Harry made a 'subtle gesture of love' towards Meghan while in court in the UK - Express
articles.description: Prince Harry has recently been in the UK attending a court trial, and royal experts have noticed that his outfit may have been a touching tribute to his wife, Meghan Markle.
